name: Global Ship Lease, Inc.
description: Global Ship Lease, Inc. is a leading independent owner and operator of containerships, focused on providing comprehensive shipping solutions to a diverse group of charterers. Founded in 2007 and based in London, the company owns a fleet of modern, fuel-efficient vessels that are employed under long-term charters. Global Ship Lease has established a strong reputation in the maritime industry for its commitment to operational excellence and customer service. The company serves a broad spectrum of customers, including some of the largest container shipping lines in the world. Through its strategic focus on fleet modernization and sustainability, Global Ship Lease aims to capitalize on the growing demand for container shipping services driven by global trade. The company actively manages its fleet to ensure that its vessels meet the latest environmental and safety standards while maintaining high operational efficiency. With a robust financial position and an experienced management team, Global Ship Lease is well-positioned to navigate the dynamic shipping market and deliver value to its shareholders.

seo.meta_title: Global Ship Lease, Inc. | Independent Containership Owner and Operator
seo.meta_description: Explore Global Ship Lease, Inc., a leading provider of containership solutions with a focus on operational excellence and sustainability.

faq.question: What does Global Ship Lease do?
faq.answer: Global Ship Lease is an independent owner and operator of containerships, providing charter solutions to major shipping lines.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Global Ship Lease?
faq.answer: Ian Webber is the CEO of Global Ship Lease, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Global Ship Lease headquartered?
faq.answer: Global Ship Lease is headquartered in London, United Kingdom.

faq.question: What types of vessels does Global Ship Lease operate?
faq.answer: Global Ship Lease operates a fleet of modern containerships, including New Panamax and Ultra Large Container Vessels.

faq.question: When was Global Ship Lease founded?
faq.answer: Global Ship Lease was founded in 2007.
